items.sentence: Of all the essays I read today, I thought this one was the most interesting.
Please send in the original document, and keep a photocopy for your records.
After Tom got fired, he was escorted out to the building by security guards.
I don\'t want to give them any reason to think I\'m not willing to do my job.
If I\'d been able to speak French then, I wouldn\'t have gotten into trouble.
